resources.string: The default timers to display during a workout.
Import or export your workouts to continue your exercise program here or somewhere else.
Importing and exporting CSVs will only affect workouts, not plans or exercise groups
Restoring data will close the app so it can be completely restarted with the correct data.
Backup and restore all your data. This method of backup will keep all your plans and exercise groups, but cannot be used by other programs.
The app will now close to refresh the database.
